message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable asset that I believe would be highly beneficial to your operations.  My research indicates it's worth at least $1,500,000 to someone in your position. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000, which represents a significant discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this opportunity.  Let me know your decision.
